Package edu.cnm.deepdive.dicecrunch.viewmodel

Class CustomDieViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • edu.cnm.deepdive.dicecrunch.viewmodel.CustomDieViewModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleObserver
    public class CustomDieViewModel
extends AndroidViewModel
implements LifecycleObserver
    A ViewModel to manage the state and business logic of creating, editing and deleting a custom die.
